Song.title: Jesus is Better
Song.copyright: Aaron Ivey and Brett Land, (c) 2013 Austin Stone Music (ASCAP).

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]There is no other, [D]so sure and steady, [A]my hope is held in your [D]hand [A]When castles crumble, [D]and breath is fleeting, [A]upon this rock I will [D]stand [F#m] Upon this rock I will [D]stand
Chorus: [D] Glory, [A]glory, [E] we have no [F#m]other king [D] But Jesus [A]Lord of [E]all [D] We raise the [A]anthem, [E] our loudest [F#m]praises ring [D] We crown Him [A]Lord of [E]all
Turn: [A D A D]
Verse 2: [A]Your kindly rule has, [D]shattered and broken [A]the curse of sin’s [D]tyranny [A]My life is hidden, [D]‘neath Heaven’s shadow, [A]Your crimson flood covers [D]me, [F#m] Your crimson flood covers [D]me
Chorus: [D] Glory, [A]glory, [E] we have no [F#m]other king [D] But Jesus [A]Lord of [E]all [D] We raise the [A]anthem, [E] our loudest [F#m]praises ring [D] We crown Him [A]Lord of [E]all
Opt. Inst: [A - D - A - E - F#m - D - A - E]
{new_page} Bridge: [A]In all my sorrows, [D] Jesus is better, [F#m]make my heart be[D]lieve [A]In all my victories, [D] Jesus is better, [F#m]make my heart be[D]lieve [A]Than any comfort, [D] Jesus is better, [F#m]make my heart be[D]lieve [A]More than all riches, [D] Jesus is better, [F#m]make my heart be[D]lieve [A]Our souls declaring, [D] Jesus is better, [F#m]make my heart be[D]lieve [A]Our song eternal, [D] Jesus is better, [F#m]make my heart be[D]lieve
Chorus: [D] Glory, [A]glory, [E] we have no [F#m]other king [D] But Jesus [A]Lord of [E]all [D] We raise the [A]anthem, [E] our loudest [F#m]praises ring [D] We crown Him [A]Lord of [E]all
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 there is no other so sure and steady my hope is held in your hand when castles crumble and breath is fleeting upon this rock i will stand upon this rock i will stand chorus glory glory we have no other king but jesus lord of all we raise the anthem our loudest praises ring we crown him lord of all turn verse 2 your kindly rule has shattered and broken the curse of sins tyranny my life is hidden neath heavens shadow your crimson flood covers me your crimson flood covers me chorus glory glory we have no other king but jesus lord of all we raise the anthem our loudest praises ring we crown him lord of all opt inst bridge in all my sorrows jesus is better make my heart believe in all my victories jesus is better make my heart believe than any comfort jesus is better make my heart believe more than all riches jesus is better make my heart believe our souls declaring jesus is better make my heart believe our song eternal jesus is better make my heart believe chorus glory glory we have no other king but jesus lord of all we raise the anthem our loudest praises ring we crown him lord of all
